item.description:
Note: This event is on a WEDNESDAY, not the regular Tuesday!

One of the powerful (& beautiful) outcomes of the Boston Marathon Bombing is the outpouring of LOVE that makes us so strong in Boston. Love encompasses kindness, compassion and affection.

Love is the force that nurtures life. Love helps us build resilience & face challenges. Love is at the heart of thriving relationships. We can express love in many ways: passionate love, familial love, our love of friends, & self acceptance are just a few.

Boriana Zaneva, Positive Psychology consultant, will share with you how to "attract” more meaningful, lasting loving connections that manifest in acts of kindness towards others, one’s self, as well as humanity as a whole. You will practice how to open your heart for more of that vital force called LOVE & learn practical tips and tools to cultivate healthy, strong, lasting relationships.

Tom Maloney, LoA Meetup member & a Certified NLP Coach, will be speaking about the power of Self Love. Learn how to provide for your own needs & the balance necessary to be a magnificent "love attractor".

The money collected during the meetup will go towards "The One Fund Boston", the purpose of which is to raise money to help families most affected by the tragic events that unfolded during Boston Marathon on 4/15/13.

****************************************************
About Boriana Zaneva:
http://www.zaneva.com/bio.html

About Tom Maloney:
http://www.climbingthesuccessladder.com/about-tom-maloney/

****************************************************
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.

We provide appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your support!

****************************************************
For parking & directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :

(1) Go here: http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/

(2) Log in

(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Power of Love: How to Attract It
